alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 8:43AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Helena, northwestern St. Tammany, northeastern Livingston, northeastern East Feliciana, Tangipahoa and southwestern Washington Parishes, southwestern Pike, east central Wilkinson and Amite Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 843 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gloster to near Robert. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Liberty, Greensburg, Amite, Amite City, Kentwood, Centreville, Independence, Roseland, Albany, Gloster, Folsom, Osyka, Montpelier, Darlington, Wilmer, Natalbany, Felps, Gillsburg and Easleyville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 33 and 37. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 30 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
